user.title: Add a time-based cover
user.description: Choose a name for your cover. After creating it, add the **Cover Time Based** card to a dashboard to configure all settings.

deprecated_yaml.title: YAML configuration is deprecated
deprecated_yaml.description:
Configuring Cover Time Based using YAML is deprecated and will be removed in a future version.

Please remove the YAML configuration and recreate your covers using the UI: **Settings > Devices & Services > Helpers > Create Helper > Cover Time Based**.

set_known_position.name: Set cover position
set_known_position.description: Sets a known position for the cover internally.

entity_id.name: Entity ID
entity_id.description: The entity ID of the cover to set the position for.

position.name: Position
position.description: The position of the cover, between 0 and 100.

set_known_tilt_position.name: Set cover tilt position
set_known_tilt_position.description: Sets a known tilt position for the cover internally.

entity_id.name: Entity ID
entity_id.description: The entity ID of the cover to set the tilt position for.

position.name: Position
position.description: The tilt position of the cover, between 0 and 100.

start_calibration.name: Start calibration
start_calibration.description: Start a calibration test to measure a timing parameter. The cover will begin moving — call stop_calibration when the desired endpoint is reached.

timeout.name: Timeout
timeout.description: Safety timeout in seconds — motor will auto-stop if stop_calibration is not called

direction.name: Direction
direction.description: Direction to move during the test. If not set, auto-detects based on current position

stop_calibration.name: Stop calibration
stop_calibration.description: Stop an active calibration test. Calculates the result and saves it to the configuration unless cancelled.

cancel.name: Cancel
cancel.description: If true, discard the test results without saving

card.confirm_cancel_calibration: A calibration is running. Cancel it and continue?
card.yaml_warning: This entity uses YAML configuration and cannot be configured from this card. Please migrate to the UI: Settings > Devices & Services > Helpers > Create Helper > Cover Time Based.

tilt_motor.label: Tilt Motor
tilt_motor.safe_position_helper: Tilt moves here before travel (100 = fully open)
tilt_motor.max_allowed_helper: Tilt only allowed when cover position is at or below this value (0 = closed, 100 = open)

position.label: Current Position
position.helper: Move cover to a known endpoint, then set position.

sequential.travel_time_close: Start with cover fully open. Click Finish when the cover is fully closed, before the slats start tilting.
sequential.travel_time_open: Start with cover closed and slats open. Click Finish when the cover is fully open.
sequential.tilt_time_close: Start with cover closed but slats open. Click Finish when the slats are fully closed.
sequential.tilt_time_open: Start with cover and slats closed. Click Finish when the slats are open.

dual_motor.travel_time_close: Start with cover open and slats in safe position. Click Finish when the cover is fully closed.
dual_motor.travel_time_open: Start with cover closed and slats in safe position. Click Finish when the cover is fully open.
dual_motor.tilt_time_close: Start with cover closed and slats open. Click Finish when the slats are fully closed.
dual_motor.tilt_time_open: Start with both cover and slats closed. Click Finish when the slats are fully open.

inline.travel_time_close: Start with both cover and slats fully open. Click Finish when both are fully closed.
inline.travel_time_open: Start with both cover and slats fully closed. Click Finish when both are fully open.
inline.tilt_time_close: Start with slats fully open. Click Finish when the slats are fully closed.
inline.tilt_time_open: Start with slats fully closed. Click Finish when the slats are fully open.

none.travel_time_close: Click Finish when the cover is fully closed.
none.travel_time_open: Click Finish when the cover is fully open.

hints.min_movement_time: Click Finish as soon as you notice the cover moving.
